channel.title: Server Ideas
channel.description:
I don't know if this is in the wrong section or not but heres what i wanted to say.
I have a 24-7 VPS hosted server with about 8 loyal players (server is two days old) The problem i have is... I need something to actually make it stand out now that everyone is using deltascape and such. I have added a few custom minigames and items but still it doesn't stand out Post some ideas here on what I could add or add me on msn: xskaterx1165@aol.com

item.title: Server Ideas
item.dc:creator: @str_pk3 str pk3
item.description:
@str_pk3 wrote:

hey add models that would be good cuz models should be power full and funny to have in server ppl will populate after some days and here u go ur server got at least more than 18 player like other servers, a really cool model pack is like pvscape model p4ck v3 very popular pack 2 lol

Read full topic

item.title: Server Ideas
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Skillapwnz:

I suggest you add like a darkbow mini game or a partyhat minigame that would be pretty cool and like a lottery system so that people randomly win the lottery and its like 50m for a lottery ticket and u have like a chance to win 100m or like a phat or d claws something good i had a lottery system but it failed cuz i kept getting error and i couldn’t fix it. its possible though

No thanks, i want an economy.

Read full topic
